Member Function Documentation

void CSwordTreeKey::key (  const char *    key )  [virtual]
 

Set/get the key.

If the parameter is not set (means equal to QString::null) the used key is returned. Otherwise the key is set and the new on ei returned.

Implements CSwordKey.
